EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to customer when Invoice has been generated
EmailTemplate.name: Invoice Generated Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Signage Request Approved and Invoice is Attached
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your request has been approved! Your total payment of {!Case.Net_Due__c}. is due by {!Case.Payment_Due_Date__c}. To make a payment online, please follow the link below and click the Visa button. Otherwise, please write and send a check payable to the SFMTA. Installation of your request will not begin until payment has been received and processed.
{!Case.Link}
Please review your attached invoice.
Thank you,
SFMTA
